descriptions.documentManagement: Upload registrations through our document indexing service or complete a document search.
descriptions.documentIndexing: Index your documents using our document indexing service for easy access and search.

id.label: Entity ID
id.description: Enter the entity ID of this document filing. The entity ID must be entered if there is one.

checkbox.label: I do not have an Entity ID

dateSelect.label: Filing Date
dateSelect.description: Enter date of filling or the registration date which was entered into BC Registries.

documentUpload.title: Upload Documents
documentUpload.help: File must be a PDF. Maximum 50 MB.
documentUpload.fileSizeError: Documents exceeds maximum 50 MB file size
documentUpload.fileTypeError: Documents must be of PDF file type

documentReview.title: Document Information Saved
documentReview.description: Your document information has been successfully uploaded and saved. To view, complete a search on the document management page using the following information
